items.sentence: Tom told Mary that I was determined to do that.
Tom told Mary he'd seen that movie three times.
Tom told everyone that he'd decided to do that.
Tom told me he thought he was losing his sight.
Tom said he wished he hadn't gone to Australia.
Tom says that he isn't planning to go anywhere.
It seems Tom is aware that Mary didn't do that.
Do you remember what classes we have on Monday?
Mary is one of the prettiest girls that I know.
Mary is just a friend. She isn't my girlfriend.
